definition: to follow/from/it is for...to/reason/cause/because of/due to/to/to leave it (to sb)/by (introduces passive verb)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Functions consist of a header and a body.
sentences.chinese: 函數由頭部分和體部分組成。

sentences.english: I am very interested in your love story before, you'd better tell me a complete story.
sentences.chinese: 我好有興趣知你噶戀愛史，最好由頭到尾同我講一次。
